reviewText: Sadly, this DVD - paid for and delivered - doesn't play on my devices, nor those of friends . . . There was no mention of the 'zones' in the blurb offering this product . . . Alas, money spent, without avail : - (((

I can't watch the darn thing because it has the wrong region code. That would be important information to share when selling DVDs. If you're living in the United States, do not buy from the guy because his DVDs won't play in American DVD players. What a waste of $20.
